title: NYC Bike Expo 2016
desc: Two days of all things road cycling in the heart of Manhattan presented to 15,000 visitors from over 70 countries Campagnolo Gran Fondo New York  is the main attraction Admission is free and open to the general public Friday, May 13 @ 11am-7pm (last entry at 6:45pm)  Saturday, May 14 11am-6pm (last entry at 5:45pm) 69th Regiment Armory in midtown Manhattan on Lexington Avenue at 26th Street? (68 Lexington Avenue, NY 10010 ) Free, secure bike parking on-site. Bring your bike through the main entrance on Lexington Ave. Once you walk past the lobby, you will see signs directing you to the left to secure bike parking. You will be able to check your bike in with security staff. ? 4, 6 trains to 23rd Street  N, R trains to 28th Street Contact info@nycbikeexpo.com
